CustomField.formula: ((No_of_trips_per_month__c * Distance_in_KM__c )* ( Cost_of_Fuel_per_litre__c / Fuel_Avg_in_LtrHr__c )) + (ROUND(( No_of_trips_per_month__c * Distance_in_KM__c * Cost_of_1_tyre__c * No_of_tyres__c )/ Life_of_new_tyres_in_Km__c ,0)) + + Drivers_Salary__c + CleanerOperator_Salary__c + Taxes_Permit__c + Maintenance_Cost__c +Misc_Exps__c
CustomField.label: Total Expenses
